title: Litro to distribute one million LP gas cylinders within 10 days
body_lines: Litro Gas says that there are adequate stocks of domestic LP gas cylinders at its storage terminal in Kerawalapitiya.
Chairman of Litro Gas Lanka, Mr. Theshara Jayasinghe further said that a million cylinders of liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) will be distributed island-wide within the next 10 days.
